# Covid-19
<h1>Web Application to track Covid-19 data!</h1>
<h2> Hey there! I'm Ruchit 👋 </h2>

<img align="right" alt="GIF" src="https://camo.githubusercontent." width="500"/>
<h2> 👨🏻‍💻 How to run the app? </h2>

<h3> Step 1: Clone the repo </h3>

<h3> Step 2: create virtual environment: 'python -m venv <env_name>' </h3>

<h3> Step 3: Activate the environment: '<env_name>\Scripts\activate' </h3>

<h3> Step 4: Install the dependencies: pip install -r requirements.txt </h3>

<h3> step 5: run it on local host: 'streamlit run Covid19-Dashboard.py' </h3>

<h3>The Dashboard can be accessed via following link: </h3>
<a href="https://covid19sars-8322cab4a1ed.herokuapp.com/">Heroku Link</a>
<a href="https://covid-19-nijkrqu8mske78ribfmcfj.streamlit.app/">Streamlit Link</a>
